The Federal Council recognises that the cyber problem is primarily linked to its influence on existing tasks and responsibilities of authorities, the private sector and society
Minimising cyber risks is thus a matter for the relevant responsible parties
The Federal Council wishes to promote the opportunities and advantages cyberspace entails for Switzerland's economy, politics and population
However, it also notes that developments in this area are associated with risks and that corresponding measures to minimise these are necessary
This national strategy governs the application of the described measures in times of peace and thus explicitly excludes war
